metadata.description: They last met in a two-part episode on the classic 1960s Batman television series-now Batman and The Green Hornet join forces again! They're up against the same criminal they took on in their previous meeting-only this time he's been promoted from Colonel to General Gumm! Can they overcome this more deadly Gumm and his surprising accomplice?
metadata.name: Batman '66 Meets The Green Hornet
